title: The overall disappointment
body: Hello dear Riot Games.I have been playing your game since the december of 2009/2010 i really can't remember.It was amazing going thru your game and experience the joy when the new champions came out and all.I didn't really have any money to pay for the skins but you did earn from me couple of times.I was cyclying thru many accounts like:serlok holms,attlaas,master of sharks,alexandar the lord and many more.But lately i don't know if it's a bug or something but when i enter the game it is loading and it says i don't have internet connection and it says to reconnect and i do and it is the same the second time.The third time i enter the game but certain time passes and the whole pc crashes(the screen freezes).And i today finished my restrictions from afk warning(20 minutes) and today it happened to me again.I can't stand it unless you could help me that doesn't happens again unless i will say goodbye for good for this game.Thanks.

replies.body: Yeah you disabled my pbe account bcs link on the mail that you sent me didn't work so thanks for that too :)

Connections errors usually happen as a result of, well... connection errors! :P

Usually, this means there's some sort of configuration or incident between your PC and our servers that's causing your connection to drop. This is usually fixed pretty easily by working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it covers common network misconfigurations.

Let me know if those steps helped.
